description.p: Components is a view in the admin interface, under Blueprints, that allows you to manage events, data sources, and utilities.
The Components view can be accessed in the admin interface, under Blueprints > Components.
The components view lists, in three separate columns, all of a project’s events, data sources, and utilities. The lists are sorted alphabetically.
To create a component, click the green Create New button at the top of the appropriate list. To edit an item, simply click its name.

summary.p: Components refers collectively to a Symphony project’s events, data sources, and utilities.
